name: Classic Pearl Stud Earrings
description: Timeless freshwater pearl studs set on sterling silver posts. Perfect for everyday elegance.

name: Elegant Pearl Pendant Necklace
description: Single freshwater pearl pendant on a delicate silver chain. A minimalist statement piece.

name: Multi-Strand Pearl Bracelet
description: Lustrous pearls hand-strung into a chic multi-strand bracelet with gold clasp.

name: Black Pearl Drop Earrings
description: Elegant black freshwater pearls dangling from gold-plated hooks. Subtle luxury.

name: Rose Gold Pearl Ring
description: A delicate rose gold band with a single shimmering freshwater pearl centerpiece.

name: Triple Pearl Choker Necklace
description: A bold statement piece featuring three graduated freshwater pearls set on a sleek black velvet choker.

name: Baroque Pearl Drop Earrings
description: Unique baroque pearls elegantly dangling from sterling silver hooks, perfect for evening wear.

name: Layered Pearl Chain Necklace
description: Two delicate chains layered with tiny pearls for a refined and modern touch.

name: Pearl and Crystal Hairpin Set
description: Set of three elegant hairpins featuring pearls and sparkling crystals, ideal for special occasions.

name: Twisted Gold Pearl Bangle
description: Open bangle with a twisted gold design, adorned with a single pearl on each end.

name: Minimalist Pearl Anklet
description: A simple gold anklet with a single freshwater pearl charm for a beachy, elegant look.

name: Vintage Pearl Brooch
description: An ornate vintage-style brooch featuring a central pearl framed with delicate gold filigree.
